panels.description:
Registers the duration of a command in the registry.
Meaning measures time that the command handler takes to execute.

targets.expr: sum by (request) (rate(axon_commands_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", context=~"$context"}[30s]))/ sum by (request) (rate(axon_commands_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", context=~"$context"}[30s]) )

panels.title: Latency

panels.description: Command types per second
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Routing by application instances
panels.title: Routing

panels.description:
Registers the duration of a query in the registry.
Meaning measures time that the query handler takes to execute.

targets.expr: sum by (request) (rate(axon_queries_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", context=~"$context"}[30s]))/ sum by (request) (rate(axon_queries_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", context=~"$context"}[30s]) )

panels.title: Latency

panels.description: Query types per second
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description:
Queries: Total number of subscription queries subscribed per application

Updates: Total number of updates submitted on subscription queries per application

Active: Active number of subscription queries on this node per application
